Title: Aka'magosh
Description:
The Kosh'harg has been a great success, in no small part thanks to you, $n.

All that is left is for Aggra to perform the ceremony to bring the festival to an official close.

I wish to speak to the crowd before we all disperse again, on some things long overdue in being said.
ObjectivesText: Observe the formal closing of the Kosh'harg.
